postCreateCommand: bash -c 'curl -s "https://get.sdkman.io" | bash && source $HOME/.sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh && sdk install java 17.0.8-tem && sdk default java 17.0.8-tem && echo "export JAVA_HOME=$HOME/.sdkman/candidates/java/current" >> $HOME/.bashrc && echo "export PATH=\$JAVA_HOME/bin:\$PATH" >> $HOME/.bashrc'
